Reviews.Title: “Nicest owners ever!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Debra D
Reviews.Content: The owners Mary and her husband are very hard working great people who care about their motel. They try their hardest to make you feel welcome and safe. They work every day and keep smiles on their faces. The price is perfect and the location is the best! You get a REAL kitchen and can walk across the street for a relaxing day at the beach. Safest part of the town too!

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: lutate
Reviews.Content: want to give shout-out to this wonderful motel,,,very clean, very friendly, ver safe,across street from beach & a great price only 185.oo a week...i want to come back to live there,u and ure husband made me felt so welcome, ure are both such hard worker/owners...runnning both places and still make time to make sure everyone is taking care of,,,everything clean and safe,,thank u very much ....will see you both real soon again....

Reviews.Title: “New managment”
Reviews.Author: Dawnspringer
Reviews.Content: Gloria is gone new managers are very friendly and helpful. Very nice makes sure you have nice friendly experience. Ask everyday if need anything. Clean rooms not fancy but nice. Will be back. Owners are the nicest people. Felt very safe lady at front desk watches lot round clock.

Reviews.Title: “not happy”
Reviews.Author: Kenneth G
Reviews.Content: today is june the 5 my family and i were moving down to fl from tn we had gotten here on may the 10th the price was 200 for a room with a kitchen it was not a bad price to have the beach and enough room for 2 adults and 3 kids and still be able to cook full meals when we moved in here gloria was the manager here she was wonderfull to is as long as you respected her she respected you she decided to leave here about 3 or 4 days ago altho we still decided to stay friends because she was so helpfull to us we didnt feel alone anymore when she was around well today when we were about to pay the rent for the next week to the male owner of the place he said he didnt want it he wanted us out now we ever caused any trouble here we were always on time and when i asked yesterday to the same man about the rent cause we thought we were going to have to pay day to day he said wed work something out but all of a suden because gloria was here talking to us he wouldnt take the full week i was gonna pay for the floors of this place are discusting but as long as you wore 3 pairs of socks a day ur feet would stay clean the air works kinda if you are gonna stay here just watch whom ur friends with cause apparently theycan tell u who to be friends with and whom you can not talk to ju st watch ur back

Reviews.Title: “A terrible experience.”
Reviews.Author: Tellthetruthb
Reviews.Content: What a mean and nasty manager,Gloria. She runs it by herself and acts like she hates every second of it. She calls it her hotel or her house although the real owners are next door. Very nice people, but Gloria is insane. She wont give you anything you need or ask for so take all of your own stuff. She couldnt pay me to stay there again. Horrible,horrible service.

Reviews.Title: “The owner, Mary and her husband are great but the manager, Gloria had a horrible atitude towards customers!”
Reviews.Author: agrimm75
Reviews.Content: Cost wise with a kitcen this place is awesome. 200$ a week for a room with a decent kitchen that allows me to cook for myself and my children. Cleanliness is not so great. The room service (changing of towels and claning of the floors) is horrible. If you ask for clean towels daily, Gloria gives you an "are you serious" attitude and has twice informed me that they "do no change out towels everyday". The vac is only run once a week and it was a big deal when I wanted my sheets changed after being in this room 10 days. I have yet to see them mop the kitchen and bathroom floors which today turned a brand new white pair of socks black in less than 5 minuets. The sheets that they say are clean not only feel dirty, they do not have a fresh smell to them and the comforters have not been washed in a very long time. I have twice now informed Gloria that my air conditioner is freezing only to be told it was brand new last summer and to stop opening my door. I am hardly ever here and the a/c is freezing over at night when set at 75. I was told tonight that there is a brand new one to be installed but not told when. Needless to say, its about 80 degrees outside and easily 90 in the room that has NO screens to be able to keep the windows open. There is supposed to be free wifi yet 5 different cell phones on 2 dfferent carriers can't pick up the wifi and neither can a fairly new laptop. There are NO landlines in these rooms so if you don't have a cell phone you better hope you don't have an emergency. When I came into the kitchen and saw no dishes or pots and pans, I asked about this and was told by Gloria they were not supplied. Guess you better pack the camping gear or plan to buy things to cook and eat with. Over all, this place is a dump. I will be talking to Mary tomorow and looking for another place to stay if conditions do not improve drastically as of tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: “dont waste your money”
Reviews.Author: Pghnumber1
Reviews.Content: The lady at the front desk treats you as if shes doing you a favor letting you stay. If u ask for toilet paper shes very rude. I asked her for a broom at 1pm she yelled at me. Very uncomfortable stay. Dont waste your money. She walks around the parking lot all day like a drill sargeant. Terrible service.

Reviews.Title: “Nice-N-Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Aquarious-Angel
Reviews.Content: My Stay here was good. I have no Negiative things to say about this place. Gloria was really Kind and Friendly. They give good services She has helped me out a great deal and wanted to say thank u very much Gloria. You keep doing what you are doing.

Reviews.Title: “Wonder and Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: Sharizma
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality, excellent service, superior rates, and cleanliness. Every year my family and I travel to Daytona for Biketoberfest every year we stay at the Happy Holiday Motel. I usually call Gloria about 2 months in advance and reserve my room. The best rooms are the 1 of 4 studio like rooms. Two queen beds, full kitchen, front and back balcony, full bathroom, couch and many other amenities. The service is excellent. She allows my family and I to park our truck trailor and motorcycles in the back so that ppl will not destroy or steal or property, whether or not they are staying at the motel w/us. The other plus is that they do not raise they're rates as many do even though it is a huge and special event in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS”
Reviews.Author: bayz13
Reviews.Content: The place was absolutely filthy, the woman at the front desk was rude - when l woke up with a million bites from bed bugs all over me she refused to change the sheets or spray insecticide, or even move me to another room OR refund my money after paying for a week up front. DONT GO... unless you dont care about your skin.

HotelInfo.Name: Happy Holiday Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 1617 North Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, FL 32118
